@peter_meighan @kylegriffin1 that's beautiful!
The world feels like a dark place right now. So dark.
It's phenomenal how people can speak so confidentially in ignorance.
I just watched a video of Muslims in Ireland talking about their lives and the comments underneath were full of ignorant misconceptions
I want to live in a world where if you're ignorant about something you don't share your opinion on it. You don't know anything about Islam.
Islam didn't create ISIS but years of this did.
If the rest of the world started to understand Islam then the naive and I'll who join ISIS would realise that ISIS isn't Islam.
Muslims have been abused got years and now they're being treated like the cause and the enemy.
Who's to say the next president will reverse any of Trumps work?
I'm more worried for the friends and family this directly effects now, but in future it could and will effect thousands more of us
But damn, I plan to work in software and continue acting. What does that mean for opportunities I may face in future?
I've never though to prove that I'm not a terrorist because the idea is ludicrous to me. I mean who thinks to prove they're not a murderer?
At first I wasn't thinking about how it could effect me at all, I was just worried about the mentality spreading - when people think it's ok
@libertyprime7 "quick. Trump is coming. He won't be my friend if he finds out!"
@libertyprime7 I screenshotted it just fifteen minutes ago. Bizarre.
